name: Plinko - Game Boy
description:
Plinko is a classic game of luck where tokens  drop through the machine and bounce off pegs as they go. Where they land  determines the prize!
Controls
ActionKeyStart Gamez, j or alt   Skip Textz, j or alt   Move Token  Lefta or left arrow      Move  Token Right      d or right arrow       Drop  Token z, j or  Exit Game  (Save High Score)       Enter
 
 
Keep playing for a high score!
